# The Enterprise Cloud powering Generative AI, Digital Twins and Spatial
Computing

Accelerate your digital transformation journey with our robust, high-
performance GPU cloud infrastructure, tailor-made for the demanding
computational needs of today’s enterprises.

Get started

_Awarded the title of 2023 Data Quadrant **Gold Medalist** in the Desktop-as-
a-Service (DaaS) category by SoftwareReviews_

### Superior GPU-Acceleration

Experience unparalleled computational power with Cloudalize. Powered by
NVIDIA’s cutting-edge GPU technology, enjoy faster simulations, seamless
graphics, and unrivaled performance. Transform your tasks and projects by
tapping into the future of processing prowess.

### Effortlessly Navigate, Deploy, and Manage with Cloudalize Platform

Cloudalize’s platform offers a seamless experience tailored for optimal user
convenience. With intuitive navigation, easy blueprint deployments & user
management, and real-time credit balance tracking, it’s accessible via both
browser and dedicated app, ensuring streamlined cloud operations at your
fingertips.

### **Unlimited Software Compatibility**

Run your essential software effortlessly with Cloudalize. Whether it’s
graphic-intensive design software, complex simulations, or everyday office
applications, our platform supports them all. Enjoy unparalleled performance
and accessibility, enabling you to run all your applications, anytime and
anywhere.

### NVIDIA Omniverse™ on Cloudalize

Experience the future of collaboration and simulation with NVIDIA Omniverse,
now hosted on Cloudalize. Harness the power of real-time ray tracing, AI, and
advanced simulation capabilities seamlessly. Elevate your design and
simulation experience with the efficiency and power of Cloudalize.

## **Cloudalize-powered Enterprises & Institutions**

Customers who trust and work with Cloudalize daily to enable a secure,
flexible and secure modern working environment.

**Education & Training**

**Education & Training**

**Architecture**

**Engineering**

**Government**

**Cloudalize is a very flexible, mobile and cost-effective solution. It offers
capacity management of users depending on demand as well as offering**
**greater processing power for our software without the IT hassle to work
remotely.** ** **

**Allister Lewis**  
Head of Technology, Ayre Chamberlain Gaunt (ACG) Architects, UK

Get Started

_Awarded the title of 2023 Data Quadrant **Gold Medalist** in the Desktop-as-
a-Service (DaaS) category by SoftwareReviews_

**Our Advanced GPU Machines**

At Cloudalize, we are committed to empowering your cloud journey with powerful
GPU technology, designed to meet a broad spectrum of computational and
graphical demands. Our selection of graphics processing units (GPUs) is
curated to cater to diverse needs, ensuring high-speed computation, advanced
graphics rendering, and seamless functionality. Our models include:

  * **NVIDIA Tesla M60**
  * **NVIDIA Quadro P2000**
  * **NVIDIA RTX A6000**
  * **NVIDIA P5000**

## Technical Specifications

__

All web traffic is encoded using the Citrix HDX protocol

__

2 Data Centers: London & New Jersey

__

We support any SAML 2.0 compatible Multi-Factor Authentication solution

__

Cloudalize uses hyperconverged infrastructure

__

Remote workstations and servers are backed up hourly at the storage and VM
volume level

__

Cloudalize owns its full stack IP, from hardware design to the software layers
on top

__

Cloudalize follows GDPR regulations and has a dedicated Data Protection
Officer

__

ISO certified, TIER3 data centre

## What our customers say

> “
>
> Fabrizio NCEO, IMAGO VFX
>
> “The flexibility of Cloudalize allows Imago VFX to work with a distributed
> team of video production experts across Europe and to answer las tminute
> requests from clients. I believe in Cloudalize's Team and their product,
> when I founded my company the virtual infrastructure was Cloudalize, after 3
> years Cloudalize continues to be the virtual and cloud heart of IMAGO”

> “
>
> Chris V.Project Manager
>
> “Very easy to connect and use the virtual desktop. This helps me to use
> modelling software like 3DS Max on my Mac without having to buy an expensive
> hardware.”

> “
>
> Tom H.Architecture & Planning
>
> “We have used Cloudalize for our VDI to run Revit BIM software for our
> practice and it has been great. The connection is so quick there is no
> noticeable latency and the experience has been just like using software
> installed on the local machine.”

> “
>
> Allister L.Head of Technology (Construction)
>
> “Easy to setup and deploy, great support from the Cloudalize team. Very
> flexible and a variety of options available to deploy to users. Interface is
> easy to use and quick to understand. Costs of the VDI is very cost effective
> short term to trial, test and use quickly.”

> “
>
> John H.Principal, Architecture & Planning
>
> “All software, but most importantly our CAD software, works seamlessly. Our
> cloud storage was customized to conform to our office-based server
> configuration. Cloudalize has enabled my employees to work as efficiently
> from remote locations as they do in the office - which has improved employee
> morale and kept them safe during the COVID pandemic.”
